artist: Designer: C. Benjamin Schlick; Manufacturer: Elkington and Co.
creditline: Gift of various donors, by exchange
description: electro-formed parcel gilt cup; central male figure behind an eagle with wings outstretched flanked by armed figures seated on decorative floral scrolls; swags with birds, ribbons and masks around top rim
markings:
On bottom, stamped: [ELECTRO DEP. (diamond with illegible inscriptions) ELKINGTON & CO (crown)] surrounding an illegible monogram; 
On bottom: 4 illegible small stamps
title: Homer Cup
